desc: Groove Lab is one of the smallest pro audio dealers in the world, offering a curated selection of only the best recording equipment and audio gear. You get free shipping and free tech support just like the big boys but with a local shop feel. Need help? Just give us a call: 406-579-0575

layout.text: I'm Jamey Warren, owner of this little audio shop on the internet.
I have carefully selected everything you see here after countless hours listening and evaluating.
Unlike the big box stores, we don't sell everything, and we don't sell any cheap stuff either, only the good shit. In each category you'll find my top picks, from good to amazing!
Thanks for looking around and please,
